trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for a balloon ToolTip.
Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolTip.Balloon> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a balloon ToolTip.
Gets a visual style element that represents a balloon ToolTip that contains a link.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolTip.Balloon.Link%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a balloon ToolTip that contains a link.
Gets a visual style element that represents a balloon ToolTip that contains text.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolTip.Balloon.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a balloon ToolTip that contains text.
